entry.title: New Doc Appointment
entry.content:
Today, another Doc’s appointment is done, though I doubt if I had to make it.

I am so glad that today I felt really well, slightly headache but not bad, but still wondered what it was yesterday.

Yesterday, my feet hurt like crazy, and both of them, and I felt something weird inside my chest. Can be heart failure sign, but my God, how pathetic I feel now, but it was something wrong, I felt VERY tired right in the morning immediately after I woke up, which was weird.

I got enought sleep, but weird both feet ache, and weird feeling in my heart or chest.

Before calling the doc, I thought, “will he believe what I will say or share to him what I am feeling or have been feeling?”

Because the doc will be my new “HausArzt” and I was in doubt if this doc will actually listen.

I need someone who can “listen” to me.

So appointment will be on March 10th.

Oh I went to shop, which is now a great stuff to do with this condition :(

entry.title: Tired After Baking One Cake?
entry.content:
I think I’ve never felt THAT tired today, I was questioning myself, what have I done?

I just baked one cake yesterday, and I am dead tired today, couldn’t even pick the cake’s plate up from Kindergarten kitchen.

It was once happened, I felt so tired but I forced myself to shop as I thought, I wasn’t going to die just because I feel tired.

But in the shop, I felt like I would fall. If I don’t have kids I would risk it. But my young kids need me, so I follow what my body says today, “don’t go”.

I just can’t believe that I am feeling so very tired just because baking ONE cake. Not normal afterall.

entry.title: Scratchy Head
entry.content:
My Phsychotherapist once told me, when I comb my hair, I should pull my hair out gently, and I do it too.

However, I sometimes feel like I have ants on my head, and it feels scratchy.

I often look myself at the mirror and focusing on my head skin if there is a blood shed or something like that because I scratched them often. But it didn’t then what it is?

I want to know what I am fighting..but it aint easy when you’re alone..

entry.title: Just One Tomapirin Today - Bliss
entry.content:
Couldn’t help it this morning, took Tomapirin and it helped. Baked the cake, finished it as I have to bring it there tomorrow morning, and felt the headache.

Attempted to take another Tomapirin, but thank God, it was gone all of sudden.

I don’t feel it right now, but I have the Radiologie CD result from the doc.

Still hoping it won’t be something to worry about.

Good night.

entry.title: Testing my New Git
entry.content: Let’s see if this works. Not much in front of it though.

entry.title: Insomnia or Just Stuffed Head
entry.content:
04:28 I was awake since 03:00, as always I was thinking right after I was awake, do I have headache now?, I didn’t.

But like now when I am in front of my terminal, I have a slightly headache, I am thinking, it’s my closed nose. Nothing to be worried about.

Then after an hour trying to sleep, I failed miserably.

It’s friday, will be a sort of hectic day, still going to bake a cake for “Kindi b√∂rse” for tomorrow.

It’s just the result of tugging my little darling in bed early – result of this insomnia or full-stuffed head.

Yeah, they will ask me, why are you too worried? you have healthy kids (which is true, and I am so thankful for) and loving husband..

When I am asked like this, I wish they knew how to be in my shoes. Good night/morning.

entry.title: A Must Hello World
entry.content: Another hello world post, if you’re listening.
